documentation.text: @dev ERC-2771 specifies the context as being a single address (20 bytes).

devdoc.details: Context variant with ERC2771 support. WARNING: The usage of `delegatecall` in this contract is dangerous and may result in context corruption. Any forwarded request to this contract triggering a `delegatecall` to itself will result in an invalid {_msgSender} recovery.
